SEARCH
Package OrderService

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
OrderService.OrderService
public class OrderService extends Object
The OrderService class is the main class for the order service. It contains the main method and the handlers for the HTTP requests.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      The main method for the order service. It reads the configuration file and starts the server.
      Parameters:
      args - Usage: java OrderService args[0]
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs
